title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Combine with eggs and cheese. Mix with spaghetti. Serve with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill chicken. Cook tomatoes and spices. Add cream and cooked chicken. Simmer and serve.
